summary: Implements a Flux‑based ControlNet pipeline that transforms an input image guided by textual prompts into a new image, handling latent encoding, prompt embedding, diffusion scheduling, and decoding back to pixel space.
business_intent: Provides developers and creative professionals with an out‑of‑the‑box solution for AI‑driven image‑to‑image editing, enabling fast, controllable generation of modified visuals for marketing, design, entertainment, and other content creation workflows.
